item.title: Andrea Test: Advanced Image Upload
item.content:encoded:
Looking directly into the camera and exuding a no-nonsense confidence, the new First Lady means business. Dressed in a sleek, crisp outfit that wouldn‚Äôt look out of place in an executive boardroom, this is Melania Trump 2.0, an impressive and independent strong woman who knows what she wants and how she‚Äôs going to get it.

With the world at her feet as her husband starts his second term as US President, the former model has grown hugely in confidence since she last set foot in the White House four years ago.
item.dc:creator: Andrea Caamano

item.title: Copy of Test Breaking news when there are no articles in BNFA
item.content:encoded:
King Charles and Queen Consort Camilla have taken to social media in celebration of Princess Charlotte's eighth birthday. test sponsored

Charlotte ‚Äì the Prince and Princess of Wales's only daughter ‚Äì was born at 8.34am on 2nd May 2015 at St Mary's Hospital in Paddington, London, weighing 8lb 3oz. Relive the moment William and Kate left the Lindo Wing with their baby girl...

Testing a Caption for this Instagram EMBED!! ?¬ø

Intagram widget with no caption

Two days later, her proud parents announced her name: Charlotte Elizabeth Diana, with her middle names in tribute to her great-grandmother, the Queen and her paternal late grandmother, Princess Diana.

In honour of her special day, a message was shared on the official Royal Family Twitter account.

Alongside a new photo of Charlotte, released by Princess Kate and Prince William, a note read: ‚ÄúHappy 8th Birthday to Princess Charlotte!‚Äù It was accompanied by a party popper emoji.

The sweet new snapshot of the Princess was taken at the weekend by her mother.

DISCOVER: How Princess Charlotte is spending her 8th birthday

TOP STORY: Charlotte Casiraghi makes jaw-dropping appearance following Meghan Markle speculation

MORE: Princess Anne publicly questions King Charles's big plan over future of royals

A beaming Charlotte is seen flashing a huge grin whilst seated in a white wicker chair. She is wearing a white summer dress dotted with small posies of blue and pink flowers and has her long hair flipped over to one side.

item.title: [5833] Exclusive: Ayda Field Williams reveals her truth about learning to love herself and intimacy with Robbie Williams
item.description: Ayda Field Williams talks motherhood, love lessons and marriage with Robbie Williams
item.content:encoded:
Summer is finally here, the flowers are in bloom and love is on Ayda Field Williams‚Äôs mind during HELLO! Happiness‚Äô exclusive interview and photoshoot for Beautiful You, where we celebrate learning to love yourself. After 17 years together ‚Äì 13 of them married ‚Äì the actress is sharing the secrets of her ever-blossoming romance with pop star Robbie Williams, 49, and how they are bringing up their four children: Teddy, ten, Charlie, eight, Coco, four, and three-year-old Beau.

She gives her rock star husband credit for giving her the confidence to strive to be her best self. And while intimacy has changed as the years have passed, Ayda reveals they're no less in-sync as a couple. "The thing that always sticks with Rob and I, no matter what, is that we make each other laugh more than anyone else in the world. Laughter is our love language and it's stronger than ever. We crack each other up the same way we did 17 years ago."
item.dc:creator: Penny Walker
item.standfirst: Ayda Field Williams talks motherhood, love lessons and marriage with Robbie Williams
